property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-creature card or a creature that has abilities, and put that card into your hand. Then put the rest of the revealed cards into the battle zone. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have "Parlock" in their name can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {CENTER GOD LINK 360} (As you put this creature this creature or another God into the battle zone, choose a creature name. This creature gets the chosen name in addition to its printed name, instead of the name chosen earlier this way. Then unlink a card from one of your Gods. You may then link any number of linkable cards to this card.)

property.name: Set

property.value: ■ If you have 5 shields or more, this creature gets +5000 power and "double breaker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-15 Full Foil VS Pack: Unmerciful Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your creatures and return the rest of your creatures into your hand. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and returns the rest of their creatures into their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a card would be put from a player's deck into a zone other than the hand, that player shuffles that card into their deck instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-15 Full Foil VS Pack: Unmerciful Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is an Outrage, this creature stays in the battle zone instead. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

For each Outrage revealed, use the following Thrilling Three ability once. Then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.) } {THRILLING THREE}This turn, this creature breaks an additional shield.

property.value: ■ Destroy one of your creatures. If you do, search your deck. You may take a creature from among your deck, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 7 or more Outrage in the battle zone, each of your Outrage in the battle zone gets +77777 power and breaks an additional 7 shields until the end of the turn. If you don't have 7 Outrage in the battle zone, each of your Outrage in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.
